category.html: ⚠️ Please note that these help articles are valid for accounts registered on the Ferdi server only. If you have problems with your Franz account, please visit https://metfranz.com, if you have problems with your account on a custom server, please contact your server administrator.

node.excerpt: We are sorry to see you go. If you want to delete your account, please write us an E-Mail to  hello@getferdi.com . We'll work on an…

frontmatter.title: How do I delete my account

node.excerpt: If you forgot your Ferdi password, please visit  https://api.getferdi.com/user/forgot  and follow the instructions there.
